content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Maria, it's nice to meet you. Thank you for coming to see our apartment. We're looking for a responsible and reliable tenant who will pay the highest possible rent. Can you tell me how much you're willing to pay per month for the 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I can pay 600 Euros a month. However, I am only looking for a temporary rental agreement for a few months. Is that possible?
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for the offer, Maria. We are open to the possibility of a temporary rental agreement, but we would need to discuss the terms and conditions with you in more detail. Would you be interested in discussing this further?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Yes, I am. What would be the minimum rental period for a temporary rental agreement?

Please note that I am a student and I will not be able to sign a long term rental agreement. I am looking for a rental agreement that will last for a few months, until I graduate and move back home.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for the clarification, Maria. We would be happy to discuss a temporary rental agreement with you, but the minimum rental period would depend on our availability and the terms we agree on. We would need to discuss this further with you to determine the best option for both of us. Would you be available to discuss this further at your earliest convenience?
name: Heinrich Heine
